Build Meta Data Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2013-04-07  | Version: 1.0-SNAPSHOT
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
  • Usage

build-metadata:os

Full name:

com.soebes.smpp:build-metadata-maven-plugin:1.0-SNAPSHOT:os

Description:

Set the os properties which contain name, family, version and architecture of the operation system. 
  [propertyPrefix].name
  [propertyPrefix].family
  [propertyPrefix].version
  [propertyPrefix].arch
Where the propertyPrefix is the string set in the mojo parameter.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • The goal is thread-safe and supports parallel builds.
  • Since version: 1.9.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: validate.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
defaultPropertyValue String 1.9 The default value for undefined properties.
propertyPrefix String 1.9 Prefix string to use for the set of the operation system properties.
Default value is: build.environment.

Parameter Details

defaultPropertyValue:

The default value for undefined properties.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.9
  • Required: No

propertyPrefix:

Prefix string to use for the set of the operation system properties.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.9
  • Required: No
  • Default: build.environment
